description:
Water slide beach adventure is a new VR free game of water slide riding at the Dubai water park. Experience the real life sensation of Water slide adventure with your mobile virtual reality headset for Google Cardboard or any mobile virtual reality headset! Water slider beach racing is a top VR water park tycoon; built to mimic the experience of sliding down a massive thrilling water slide ride.
Presenting to you for the first time, a highly immersive extreme water slide riding adventure game! Enjoy your very own water park water slide twisters in a beautiful sunny beach of Dubai- first time in VR racing. Feel the thrill of this 3D water slider at a luxurious Dubai beach with lots of water splashing action. Feel the real life sensation of this 3D water slider at a luxurious Dubai sites in VR beach with lots of water splashing action & Virtual Reality thrills! Chase the adrenaline rush as you twist and tilt your way round tight corners, make loops and whizz through at lightning speeds. But watch out, the edges are steep and there are some little surprises and gold coins along the way. This is fun game in which you can enjoy all the amazing rides which are in the real water park. Sandy beach, clean water, luxurious resorts, beach umbrellas with beach balls, sea shells, sand castle buildings, beach toys & beach buckets what’s not to like about this water slide game free 3d? Everyone is welcome in the world of most amazing 3D water park waterslide simulator. It’s a fun game for girls and a water park sport for boys and a water park amusement ride for elders. Take a break from all other roller coaster simulators and crazy theme park and water park free race rides for family thrill ride sites in VR.
VR water slide beach adventure features lots of twister ride madness worth downloading! Featuring the most amazing water sport game at your favorite destinations, a unique VR experience with best water slides at world’s best water racing and drifting sites in VR. Water slide beach adventure is a game that is 1 of its kind, with smooth controls, good lifebuoy boat adventures, amazing rollercoaster twists & turns, it’s impossible not to have fun with this hydro slide. Enjoy your very own VR water park water slide at a beautiful sunny beach with VR box or any other VR glasses with dashing & splashing waterfall action in a destination of your choice. Install 100% FREE VR Water slide Beach adventure to begin your own VR water adventure!
WATER SLIDE BEACH ADVENTURE FEATURES
- Slide your device into the VR glasses/VR box
- Real VR water slide racing physics through VR glasses
- Easy controls to move while riding the VR thrill ride
- smooth VR twister ride controls
- Water slide extreme jumping
- Superb first person controls
- Fastest thrilling joyride of twists & turns
- Exhilarating physics guaranteed to give you an adrenaline rush!
HOW TO PLAY
- Tilt mobile from left to right to collect coins
- Watch out for the edges if you don’t wish to fall
- Avoid obstacles & other dangers while racing down the slide
- Free to download & user friendly
